projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Some of the projects I've worked on.

carousel_description_1: Computer Systems Engineer specialized in mobile development with Flutter and passionate about photography. I find inspiration by capturing unique moments.
carousel_description_2: Always looking for new perspectives through my lens. The images I capture reflect my vision of the world and my passion for details.
carousel_description_3: Combining my technical expertise with my passion for photography to create innovative solutions and impactful visual experiences.
carousel_description_4: Each project is an opportunity to connect technology and creativity, developing applications that enhance the user experience.
